title: Pediatric cancers
text: One approach exploring dataset performing PCA.  improve appearance PCA, one can precede feature selection step based coefficient variation. , step_select_cv keeps one fourth original features.  tidy method allows see features kept.
code: rec_naive_pca <-   recipe(pedcan_expression) %>%    update_role(-cell_line) %>%    step_zv(all_numeric_predictors()) %>%    step_normalize(all_numeric_predictors()) %>%    step_pca(all_numeric_predictors()) %>%    prep()  rec_naive_pca %>%    juice() %>%    ggplot() +   aes(x = PC1, y = PC2, color = disease) +   geom_point() rec_cv_pca <-   recipe(pedcan_expression) %>%    update_role(-cell_line) %>%    step_select_cv(all_numeric_predictors(), prop_kept = 1/4) %>%    step_normalize(all_numeric_predictors()) %>%   step_pca(all_numeric_predictors()) %>%   prep()  rec_cv_pca %>%    juice() %>%    ggplot() +   aes(x = PC1, y = PC2, color = disease) +   geom_point() tidy(rec_cv_pca, 1) #> # A tibble: 19,193 × 4 #>    terms       cv kept  id              #>    <chr>    <dbl> <lgl> <chr>           #>  1 A1BG    0.371  FALSE select_cv_URhJO #>  2 A1CF    4.60   TRUE  select_cv_URhJO #>  3 A2M     1.69   TRUE  select_cv_URhJO #>  4 A2ML1   2.45   TRUE  select_cv_URhJO #>  5 A3GALT2 2.37   TRUE  select_cv_URhJO #>  6 A4GALT  0.979  FALSE select_cv_URhJO #>  7 A4GNT   1.53   FALSE select_cv_URhJO #>  8 AAAS    0.0934 FALSE select_cv_URhJO #>  9 AACS    0.194  FALSE select_cv_URhJO #> 10 AADAC   3.40   TRUE  select_cv_URhJO #> # ℹ 19,183 more rows

text: large dataset, may encounter error: linked R handles many variables formulas. solve , pass dataset recipe() manually update roles update_role(), like example :
code: data("pedcan_expression") recipe(disease ~ ., data = pedcan_expression) %>%      step_select_cv(all_numeric_predictors(), prop_kept = 0.1)  #> Error: protect(): protection stack overflow recipe(pedcan_expression) %>%    update_role(disease, new_role = "outcome") %>%    update_role(-disease, new_role = "predictor") %>%    step_select_cv(all_numeric_predictors(), prop_kept = 0.1)  #>  #> ── Recipe ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #>  #> ── Inputs #> Number of variables by role #> outcome:       1 #> predictor: 19196 #>  #> ── Operations #> • Top CV filtering on: all_numeric_predictors()
